title: Self-Regulated Learning (SRL) Development for Adult Learners: A Short-Intensive Course Based on Online Peer Feedback

context.additional_context: Course combining VR simulations and mobile-based feedback tools to strengthen self-regulated learning. Designed for learners to develop metacognition and evaluation skills via peer assessment in community problem-solving scenarios.

learning_goals: Within one week, learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies (goal setting, monitoring, self-adjustment) in a VR simulation environment to complete community problem-solving tasks at an 80% or higher rate
Learners can generate and receive qualitative feedback three or more times according to peer feedback guidelines
Learners can self-assess weekly learning progress three or more times via a mobile platform and establish improvement plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
